name: Un's Table - LD49 (Unstable)
description:
An LD49 Entry.

Stop Kim Jong Un's nuclear arsenal by keeping him well fed and content. 

Click to move Joe and Donald around. Select food items from the fridge, place them on the serving hatch and use Donald to serve them up to Kim.

Disclaimer - This game is terrible and barely fits the definition of a game. But I liked my take on the theme and think it deserves to be seen.
